action_item: Requirements - Walk through the NextGen system for dental data entry.
notes: Focus on how to input demographic information and address pain points related to dental work.

action_item: Requirements - Address the wait list functionality in NextGen.
notes: Discuss how wait list patients are handled and if they should be considered in NextGen.

action_item: Requirements - Show where to input family size and income information in NextGen.
notes: Demonstrate the sliding fee schedule verification process.

action_item: Requirements - Confirm the integration of Medicaid information in NextGen.
notes: Ensure that Medicaid data entry is clearly demonstrated.

action_item: Reports - Explore the possibility of tracking referrals and services in Dr. Cloud.
notes: Discuss how to integrate tracking for services provided by external partners.

action_item: Client Portal - Investigate the capability of sending appointment alerts to patients on the wait list.
notes: Determine if there is a way to notify patients of available appointments.

action_item: Requirements - Review the document management capabilities of NextGen.
notes: Assess how documents can be shared outside of NextGen and if improvements are needed.

action_item: Requirements - Check if patient surveys can be integrated into the patient portal.
notes: Explore options for collecting patient feedback through the portal.
